metadata.title: CVE-2016-0742 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The resolver in nginx before 1.8.1 and 1.9.x before 1.9.10 allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (invalid pointer dereference andworker process crash) via a crafted UDP DNS response.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-0742` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

nginx - 1.9.10-0ubuntu1
nginx-common - 1.9.10-0ubuntu1
nginx-core - 1.9.10-0ubuntu1
nginx-extras - 1.9.10-0ubuntu1
nginx-full - 1.9.10-0ubuntu1
nginx-light - 1.9.10-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nginx package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.9.10-0ubuntu1').
